1: <pb/><t>E q'ui c'axc'ol</t> <t>in oc'owinak</t> <t>kas pa ri walc'alal</t> <t>—chubij ri Israel camic—,</t>
2: <t>e q'ui c'axc'ol in oc'owinak wi</t> <t>kas pa ri walc'alal,</t> <t>man c'u e cuininak ta chwe.</t>
3: <t>Qui socom ri uwo wij</t> <t>cumal tak rapubal,</t> <t>e qui socom ri uwo wij,</t>
4: <t>suc' c'ut ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>in resam chuxe' ri qui takanic</t> <t>ri e banal tak etzelal.</t>
5: <t>¡Chel qui q'uixbal</t> <t>xukuje' chebanimajok c'ut</t> <t>ri caquiban qui c'ulel che ri Sion!</t>
6: <t>¡Je' chebuxok jacha' ri k'ayes</t> <t>ri caq'uiy paquiwi'</t> <t>tak ri e u xotil ja,</t> <t>c'ä maja' cäbokic chaki'j chic!</t>
7: <t>K'ayes ri mawi jubik' quebuc'am ta bic</t> <t>ri k'atal trico,</t> <t>ri quebuxim ta pa tak yataj:</t>
8: <t>K'ayes ri man c'o ta jun coc'owic</t> <t>cubij ta na:</t> <t>“Ri Ajawaxel e tewechininak.” <pb/>Uj quixkatewichi'j ix</t> <t>pa ri u bi' ri Ajawaxel.</t>
